hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ "$(docker ps -aq -f status=exited -f name=vaolo_tests)" ]; then # cleanup docker rm vaolo_tests fi
if [ "$(docker images samuelboucher/vaolo_tests 2> /dev/null)" != "" ]; then docker rmi samuelboucher/vaolo_tests fi
docker pull samuelboucher/vaolo_tests timeout -k 60 60 docker run --name vaolo_tests samuelboucher/vaolo_tests
